scripts.bump-utils: for socket in $(npm run -s list-sockets); do cd $socket; npm run sync-deps && npm run sync-utils && cd ..; done
scripts.bump-all-socket-versions: npm run bump-utils && for socket in $(npm run -s list-sockets); do npx s submit -b patch $socket; done
scripts.publish-all-sockets: npm run bump-all-socket-versions && for socket in $(npm run -s list-sockets); do npx s publish $socket; done
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx s deploy
scripts.lint: standard --fix --env mocha --parser babel-eslint aws-config/src/**/* aws-storage/src/**/* aws-utils/lib/**/* aws-ls/src/**/* aws-wordpress/src/**/* aws-node/src/**/*
scripts.format: prettier --write --single-quote --no-bracket-spacing *.js aws-config/{src,test}/**/*.js aws-storage/{src,test}/**/*.js aws-utils/{lib,test}/**/*.js aws-ls/{src,test}/**/*.js aws-wordpress/{src,test}/**/*.js aws-node/{src,test}/**/*.js
